title: LFP Challenger ADC Main looking for DUO SUPPORT.
body:
Hello there!

I am a challenger player from EUW, I have just transferred my account over to OCE as I live in Australia now. I am looking for a highly talented support player that is willing to duo with me on a regular basis. You must have real game knowledge, the ability to play micro intense support champions and land your skillshots, and have a good temperament. If I have to tell you when to go and put down a ward, I will probably kill myself quietly.

I like to play passive/aggressive in lane phase and then I will dive in to 5 people for team fights and try to outplay everybody like a BOSE.

Please feel free to add me at JoshGIsaBose on league or enquire in this thread :)

replies.body: Take me under your wing and raise me from a trash silver 2 support into a god and I will be yours forever xx.
